recipesJson.name: Dutch Apple Pie
recipesJson.author: enzonik
recipesJson.description: Opens up with a nice apple taste. Hints of cinnamon, and a touch of crust. The white chocolate adds a creaminess that lingers on the exhale. It’s sweet and it’s definitely pie. It’s pretty good off a shake and vape but it definitely needs 4-5 days to really incorporate the flavors and tame the apple. The caramel and cinnamon will develop along with the slight creaminess from the white chocolate.

reviews.text: Dude this mix is amazing! That apple filling is very bright and the white chocolate just wraps it up all together. I literally can't take a hit and not lick my lips after. Well done!
